sys_hub_flow.description: Send email notification to receiver of new peer review feedback.
sys_hub_flow.name: Notify New Peer Review Feedback

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hello Trigger➛Feedback Record➛Receiver➛Name,

You have received a new peer review feedback. Check out your NPS score card here.

Thank you.

Thank you.
